metadata.inclusion: Press the program switch for at least 1 second. The LED should go off if successful.
metadata.exclusion: Press the program switch for at least 1 second.
metadata.reset:
1. Push the tamper switch
2. Insert the battery while holding the tamper switch
3. Hold the tamper switch for 5 seconds
4. Remove and reinsert the battery to complete the reset

The LED will turn solid on during the reset process.
